name: Tiny Sim
description:
Hi Aviator!

This is a tiny flight simulator based on a Cessna-172R with a G1000 glass cockpit. 

The flight model is not based on theory but observations from a real pilot. 

This game is a collaboration work,  see: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=3393 for more information!

If you are more the serious type, there is a 34-page flight manual, which explains everything in detail and features 20+ flight lessons.
